title: Biden Receives Updated Covid Booster and Urges Americans to Follow Suit
description: With a possible winter surge on the horizon, the president tried to draw attention to the retooled shots, which Americans have been slow to receive so far.
dc:creator: Noah Weiland
media:description: President Biden received his third booster shot on Tuesday. Only about 20 million doses of the new shots have been administered nationwide so far.
